div.div: Ecosystem response ratio after 45-year simulation of alternative scenarios on ( a) vertebrates and ( b) invertebrates (values normalized so 1.0 = best [highest biomass] and 0.0 = worst [lowest biomass]).
div.p: Results of “Size Limit and TAC” were very similar to only TAC results and left out for clarity. See S2 Table for functional group codes.
